attributes.action: support the current law which makes it a crime to kill another human being by assisted suicide.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is designed to counter the current threat to legalise "assisted suicide", by seeking the support of the Prime Minister for the ageless principle that to intentionally kill another human being in this way is wrong.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
